story_parts.text: The lion was very excited to go to Disney World. He had always wanted to go there and finally his dream was coming true. He packed his bags and got on the plane, ready to have the time of his life.

next_options.0: The lion was thrilled to finally be at Disney World
next_options.1: The lion was disappointed when he got to Disney World

story_parts.text: He walked around the park, taking in all the sights and sounds. He went on all the rides and ate all the food. He had a blast.

next_options.0: He went home and went to bed
next_options.1: He stayed at the park until it closed

story_parts.text: The next day, he woke up and went back to Disney World. He had so much fun that he didn't want to leave. He went home and went to bed, dreaming of all the fun he had had.

next_options.0: The next day, he went back to Disney World and had even more fun
next_options.1: The next day, he went home and didn't go back to Disney World again
